import React from 'react' import LeftSidebarperson from './Leftsidebarperson' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import user from './AccountC'; function Person() { const [agentName, setAgentName] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5432/getAgentName', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(user), }) .then((response) => response.text()) .then((data) => { setAgentName(data); // Set the retrieved name in the state }) .catch((error) => console.error('Error:', error)); }, []); return ( <>
